newsitem.title: USA: Melamine says demand remains strong.
newsitem.headline: Melamine says demand remains strong.

text.p: Melamine Chemicals Inc said on Friday that worldwide demand for melamine remains strong and no new capacity is expected for many months.
Raw materials prices have fallen for three consecutive quarters, the company said.

Melamine Chemicals, which reported higher fourth quarter results, said in a statement that it set new records for pounds produced and pounds sold despit a scheduled plant maintenance shutdown and a second outage in late June.
Since inventories were low, numerous shipments had to be delayed past its fiscal year ended June 30, 1997, it said.
